introduction: Byung Suh, a boom operator working in a Chinese film production, loses concentration after his girlfriend dumps him. He accidentally drops the boom mike from on top of the castle wall. A female police officer Bingbing helps him out through the ordeal then takes him to her favorite dumpling place. There they meet Sooning who has a crush on Bingbing. One mistake by Byung Suh leads to romantic feelings forming between Bingbing and Sooning.
